metadata.title: CVE-2021-47538 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: rxrpc:Fix rxrpc_local leak in rxrpc_lookup_peer() Need to call rxrpc_put_local()for peer candidate before kfree() as it holds a ref to rxrpc_local. [DH:v2: Changed to abstract the peer freeing code out into a function]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
